title: Lab Software
text:
#| include: false #| echo: false
library(gh) library(yaml) library(purrr)

1. Fetch all public repos for the CMMR organization
repos <- gh(‚Äú/orgs/cmmr/repos‚Äù, type = ‚Äúpublic‚Äù, .limit = 100)


2. Extract and format the data
software_data <- map(repos, ~{ list( title = .x\(name,
    description = .x\)description %||% ‚ÄúNo description provided.‚Äù, path = .x\(html_url,
    stars = .x\)stargazers_count, # Assign custom images if they exist, else use a lab placeholder image = sprintf(‚Äúhttps://raw.githubusercontent.com/cmmr/%s/main/man/figures/logo.png‚Äù, .x$name) ) })


3. Sort by stars descending
software_data <- software_data[order(map_dbl(software_data, ‚Äústars‚Äù), decreasing = TRUE)]


4. Write to software.yml for the Quarto listing to read
write_yaml(software_data, ‚Äúsoftware.yml‚Äù)
